attributes.action: Order a Judicial Review into the decision of the Nursing and Midwifery Council in the case of Margaret Haywood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The actions of Margaret Haywood are to be commended and her "striking off" leads the public to the view that The Nursing and Midwifery Council is more concerned with image than real service to patients.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
